title: HELP: Playing with my ranked team.
body:
Hi!

I just hit level 30 and my friends are too and we created ranked team. Now i have a question.
How can u play with ur team? I Looked up and it says that you select "Ranked Team" game type but i cant see it! There is no thing like "Ranked Team" Only "Ranked"..

Pls help

replies.body: Ranked team games are currently on a schedule, and will be available at different times depending on it being a weekday or weekend.  We have a [ranked teams schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) guide that will provide the times they are available.  Hope that helps!
